page.title: 09PORTAL HOUSE SCHOOL
page.content: This school is a special school for maladjusted children.It was converted into this type of school in 1977 when the headmaster was Mr.Hare.After a few years Mr.Bell took over as head and there are now 41 children in the school with 33 staff - including teachers,secretary,matron,childcare- staff,cooks,cleaners and a caretaker. The age of the children range from 9 to 13 years. There are 5 classes with approximately 7 in a class.It is a boarding school and the children get up at 7.30am,start lessons at 9.30am and finish lessons at 3.30pm. At 8.45pm they go to bed.The dormatories are quite large and have 3 to 5 single beds in each. To every 6 bedrooms there are 4 bathrooms and two showers.They have a couple of common rooms with TVs in them.The children told us they like it there very much.
